alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Clay; Putnam; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 6:51PM EDT until July 30 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bradford County in northern Florida... Southwestern St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... Northern Putnam County in northeastern Florida... Clay County in northeastern Florida... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 650 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Maxville to Bostwick, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Starke, Keystone Heights, Middleburg, New River, Florahome, Federal Point, Doctors Inlet, Bardin and Fleming Island. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
